title: Rito News show

embed.description: This is my first video in my show, I make news episodes about what happened in League of Legends and everything that has to do with League of Legends, this is however my very first episode and feedback is very much appreciated.

body: A friend of mine decided to start a small show about different thing happening in and around the league of legends community. Check it out and he's always open for some feedback!

replies.body:
Cool concept! Like Riot Girl said, big fan of the ticker. Not sure what your buddy's tech setup is, but a standing ball mic, controlled lighting and an HD webcam would really push him over the edge quality-wise, and moving less in his chair/doing a couple script passes prior to filming would really help him nail that delivery down (not bad per se, just a little distracting). (source: youtuber)

If he can squeeze the time down to 2~ minutes and throw in some jokes and a backdrop the dude will have an A+ show on his hands. Excited to see what he does with it!

I like the ticker on the bottom!  "Wards claimed a cheating device by Bronze players" <~classic. This was funny and entertaining to watch.

He should probably try to swivel in his chair a bit less in future episodes, it's a bit distracting.
